research.title: Development of an Internet of Things–Based System for Monitoring Mosquito Larvae Growth Based on Environmental Parameters for Dengue Fever Prevention
research.description: This project aims to develop an Internet of Things–based system to monitor mosquito larvae growth using environmental parameters in order to support dengue fever prevention efforts.

research.title: Design of an IoT-Based Smart Garbage System to Assist Persons with Disabilities
research.description: This project aims to design an Internet of Things–based smart garbage system that assists persons with disabilities by improving accessibility and waste management efficiency.

opensource.title: IoT Smart Trash Bin for Disability Support
opensource.description: Open-source IoT project designed to assist persons with disabilities by providing an automated and accessible waste disposal system.
